description: black leather office chair at right; reddish plant in white pot, LLQ; bare-breasted woman holding a grey cloth that covers her hands, with a black form beneath her, seen through a window at center
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Edition on back, in pencil: [Picturing Power \"Wherein one\'
title: Wherein one's legacy comes full circle and posits that you too can exploit and subjugate and fluff yourself up in a splended game of your own jolly adventure
